languages.text: {n}Блаженные не сопротивлялись своей новой участи — как и любым другим приказам. Солдаты из них выходили не слишком умелые, зато покорные, исполнительные и — что важнее всего — равнодушные к собственной смерти. Вскоре первые полки были подняты на пустотные суда на орбите и отправлены в иные области торгового протектората, а также на судно Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блаженные не сопротивлялись своей новой участи — как и любым другим приказам. Солдаты из них выходили не слишком умелые, зато покорные, исполнительные и — что важнее всего — равнодушные к собственной смерти. Вскоре первые полки были подняты на пустотные суда на орбите и отправлены в иные области торгового протектората, а также на судно Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Blessed did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not very skilful with weapons, but they were obedient, willing to do anything, and, most importantly, — indifferent to their own death. Soon, the first regiments have come on boards of the voidships on the orbit and have been sent to the other areas of the trading protectorate.{/n}

{n}The Blessed did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not very skilful with weapons, but they were obedient, willing to do anything, and, most importantly, — indifferent to their own death. Soon, the first regiments have come on boards of the voidships on the orbit and have been sent to the other areas of the trading protectorate.{/n}

{n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

{n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受召者并没有反抗他们的新命运。事实上，他们也不会反抗任何秩序。尽管他们并不是非常擅长打仗，但他们很听话，尽职尽责。最重要的是，他们全然不在乎自己的生死。很快，第一批军队就被虚空舰带到了轨道上，被送往王朝的其他地区，以及行商浪人自己的旗舰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受召者并没有反抗他们的新命运。事实上，他们也不会反抗任何秩序。尽管他们并不是非常擅长打仗，但他们很听话，尽职尽责。最重要的是，他们全然不在乎自己的生死。很快，第一批军队就被虚空舰带到了轨道上，被送往王朝的其他地区，以及行商浪人自己的旗舰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Tocados no se resistieron a su nuevo destino, ni a ninguna otra orden. No eran especialmente hábiles en la guerra, pero eran obedientes, cumplidores y, lo más importante, indiferentes a su propia muerte. Pronto, los primeros regimientos fueron llevados a la órbita en naves del vacío y enviados a otras zonas del protectorado, así como a la propia nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Tocados no se resistieron a su nuevo destino, ni a ninguna otra orden. No eran especialmente hábiles en la guerra, pero eran obedientes, cumplidores y, lo más importante, indiferentes a su propia muerte. Pronto, los primeros regimientos fueron llevados a la órbita en naves del vacío y enviados a otras zonas del protectorado, así como a la propia nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}触れられし者たちは自らの新たな運命にも...その他の命令やどのようなことにも、抵抗することはなかった。彼らは特に戦闘に長けていたわけではなかったが、従順で、真面目で、最も重要なこととして、自らの死に無関心であった。まもなく、最初の連隊がヴォイドシップに乗り込んで出発し、ローグトレーダー自身の旗艦だけでなく、保護国家の他の領域にも派遣されて行った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}触れられし者たちは自らの新たな運命にも...その他の命令やどのようなことにも、抵抗することはなかった。彼らは特に戦闘に長けていたわけではなかったが、従順で、真面目で、最も重要なこととして、自らの死に無関心であった。まもなく、最初の連隊がヴォイドシップに乗り込んで出発し、ローグトレーダー自身の旗艦だけでなく、保護国家の他の領域にも派遣されて行った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Altérés ne s'opposent pas plus à leur nouveau destin qu'aux autres ordres qui leur sont donnés. Même s'ils n'ont aucun don particulier pour la guerre, ils sont obéissants, dévoués et, plus important encore, indifférents à leur propre mort. Bien vite, les premiers régiments sont envoyés en orbite et expédiés dans d'autres régions du protectorat, ainsi que sur le propre vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Altérés ne s'opposent pas plus à leur nouveau destin qu'aux autres ordres qui leur sont donnés. Même s'ils n'ont aucun don particulier pour la guerre, ils sont obéissants, dévoués et, plus important encore, indifférents à leur propre mort. Bien vite, les premiers régiments sont envoyés en orbite et expédiés dans d'autres régions du protectorat, ainsi que sur le propre vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Berührten widersetzten sich ihrem neuen Schicksal nicht — und auch sonst keinem einzigen Befehl. Sie waren keine besonders fähigen Krieger, aber sie waren gehorsam und pflichtbewusst und vor allem war es ihnen vollkommen gleichgültig, ob sie sterben. Bald wurden die ersten Regimente auf Raumschiffen in andere Gebiete des Protektorats sowie auf das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gebracht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Berührten widersetzten sich ihrem neuen Schicksal nicht — und auch sonst keinem einzigen Befehl. Sie waren keine besonders fähigen Krieger, aber sie waren gehorsam und pflichtbewusst und vor allem war es ihnen vollkommen gleichgültig, ob sie sterben. Bald wurden die ersten Regimente auf Raumschiffen in andere Gebiete des Protektorats sowie auf das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gebracht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mütehassisler, yeni kaderlerine ve hatta tek bir emre bile karşı gelmedi. Savaş alanında çok yetenekli sayılmasalar da itaatkâr, göreve bağlı ve en önemlisi de ölüm karşısında kayıtsızdılar. Kısa süre içinde ilk alaylar, uçsuz gemilerinde yörüngeye çıkarak protektoranın diğer bölgeleriyle Hür Tacir'in hususi sancak gemisine gönderildiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not resist their newfound fate — nor any other order, for that matter. They were not particularly skilled at warfare, but they were obedient, dutiful, and most importantly, indifferent to their own deaths. Soon, the first regiments were taken to orbit on voidships and dispatched to other areas of the protectorate, as well as to the Rogue Trader's own flagship.{/n}
